content: these socks were inspired by the cabled pullover that dr john watson wears in the bbc s *sherlock* 2010 they re elementary because it s dead simple to keep track of the pattern -- the two motifs are the same number of row and all the cables get crossed on the same row you ll be memorizing the chart in no time two sizes appear separately because adapting the men s sock for girl-sizing -- what i m calling the cosplay version -- added some extra steps socks are worked toe-up with a fleegle heel the stitch pattern is charted and the rest of the instructions are written
